meanings.definition: To write or draw on a surface in a public place without permission.
meanings.sent1: The mischievous kids were graffiting the walls of the abandoned building.
meanings.sent2: The artist was caught graffiting the bridge with colorful designs.
meanings.sent3: The raccoon seemed to be graffiting the tree with its muddy paw prints.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were graffiting her heart with invisible ink, leaving a mark.
meanings.sent5: The raindrops graffiting the window created a mesmerizing pattern.

meanings.sent1: Graffiting can be a form of self-expression for many artists.
meanings.sent2: The city was filled with graffiting on every street corner.
meanings.sent3: The museum displayed a collection of graffiting from local talents.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a canvas for graffiting thoughts that never seemed to fade.
meanings.sent5: The walls were alive with the vibrant colors of graffiting.
